availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Newport, Campbell County, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Hannah Stewart Boyd on December 2, 1835. Father of Adelia A. Boyd, Lewis F. Boyd. Graduate of Cincinnati Law School in Cincinnati, Ohio, in 1836. Attorney in Newport in 1850. Attorney in Newport in 1860. Presiding judge of the Campbell County Court in Newport in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Find A Grave, "Frederick A. Boyd (1815-1891), Memorial #88459772, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/88459772, (accessed June 15, 2017).
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell, Newport, p. 44A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell, Newport, p. 616.
Law Department of the University of Cincinnati: The Cincinnati Law School, (University of Cincinnati Law Department, 1904), 10.
Tennies, Elibazath Boyd Henry, The Boyds (Xulon Press, 2007), 195.
